hero.headline: Your voice, typed instantly. Privately.
hero.subheadline: Local speech-to-text for Mac. No cloud. No subscription. No account.
hero.note: macOS 15+ · Apple Silicon · 50 free transcriptions included

privacy_section.headline: Private by Design.
privacy_section.subheadline: Your audio stays on your Mac. Always.
privacy_section.local_storage_desc: All recordings stored in ~/Library/Application Support/Verba/ — on your Mac.
privacy_section.no_account_desc: Download, launch, speak. Zero signup, zero login, zero tracking.
privacy_section.offline_desc: No internet needed. Everything runs on your Apple Silicon hardware.
privacy_section.quote: Your voice is yours. We never hear it.

features.headline: Everything you need. Nothing you don't.
features.transcription_desc: Press Fn, speak, text appears in any app.
features.languages_desc: Auto-detects your language via Whisper Large v3 Turbo.
features.push_to_talk_desc: Hold Fn for quick takes. Lock mode for hands-free recording.
features.history_desc: Every transcription saved locally with timing and duration.
features.metal_desc: Apple Silicon GPU. ~2–3s for 10s of audio.
features.translation_desc: Speak in any language, get English output instantly.
features.cleanup_desc: On-device AI removes filler words and fixes grammar.
features.telemetry_desc: No analytics, no crash reports, nothing leaves your Mac.

pricing.headline: Pay once. Own it forever.
pricing.subheadline: No subscriptions. No recurring fees. No surprises.
pricing.trial_desc: 50 transcriptions included — no credit card, no time limit, no signup
pricing.paid_desc: Unlimited transcriptions, 3 devices, all future updates

cleanup.headline: AI Text Cleanup
cleanup.subheadline: Powered by a local language model. No cloud, no API keys.
cleanup.before_text: um so basically I wanted to uh talk about the the project status and like we need to uh finish the API by next week
cleanup.after_text: I wanted to talk about the project status. We need to finish the API by next week.
cleanup.feature_fillers: Removes filler words (um, uh, like, basically)
cleanup.feature_lists: Formats spoken lists into actual bullet points
cleanup.feature_styles: Style modes: Standard, Formal, Casual, Excited
cleanup.note: Requires downloading a 985MB model. Runs entirely on your Mac. Never online.

cta_block.headline: Start speaking. Stop typing.
cta_block.note: macOS 15+ · Apple Silicon required · No account needed

footer.tagline: A private speech-to-text app for Mac. Your voice never leaves your device.
